name: Xmas Gifts Match 3
description:
Do you love Match 3 Games? So try Xmas Gifts Match 3 with unlimited game play, funny Santa Claus, Christmas tree and hint!

Match tiles by swapping 2 items to get 3 (or more) in row to make them disappear. The more tiles you'll match the more score you'll have. For each level you have a limited time to solve puzzle.

Collect gift's bonuses and decorate Christmas tree.

We did this game with Flash 8.0. Seems the page of this Xmas Gift Match 3 will be abandoned soon and we need a place where we can save this game.
